column2: "It kinda feels anticlimactic, given how easily we got in."
"Of course. For I am this star's Miko."
"Normally, the Black King would hang his head and come to my shrine."
"For him to submit a letter and me to make a personal visit... he's become quite concieted."
"Sukunahime, have you met the Black King?"
"Of course. Along with both Kings' enthronements I put up with their meetings."
"Though the White King had an aptitude for techniques, I felt he was a coward and had no capacity as a king."
"As for the Black King, he was wise. I didn't quite enjoy his pride, but he was a cute little thing."
"You did raise the issue that the Kuronians were being manipulated by [Double] to the Black King, yes?"
"That's right. If the Kuronians make a move, through their rivalry, the Shironians will unilaterally move as well."
"Then, we shall find those ominous children and exorcise them in one breath."
"This way, we avoid any more useless sacrifices."
"Fufu."
"What is it? What's so funny, Matoi?"
"I thought that no matter what Sukunahime says, she's really nice."
"You're always saying how the planet's important, but you also treasure the Kuronians and the Shironians as well, right?"
"Rather than treasure, it's more like my duty."
"Duty?"
"A duty that's been carved into my body since my birth."
"As the legends say, I was born from a Kuronian father and Shironian mother, a child of ash. As such, both Shironians and Kuronians are my relatives."
"Black or white, I can often leave their foolishness alone, but only a fiend would abandon their kin."
"As my father and mother blessed me with this life, I cannot do that."
"I'm sorry... I shouldn't have joked about that."
"Kaka, don't worry. It's just banter to pass the time. If we were serious, we would be in a place only I know."
"However, the desire to protect something or someone can produce power beyond the pale."
"Matoi, you should consider what it is that you want to protect."
"What, I want to protect..."
"It shouldn't be something as vague as \"everyone\", you know?"
